title: Clock Tower/Quick guide

properties.name: description
properties.value: Note: When placing the cogs on each respective spindle, merely move your camera so as to be able to see the ends of each spindle. Each spindle has a colour on the end. When ready to place each cog on its respective spindle, all you have to do is look at the ends of the spindles, find the spindle which matches the colour of the cog in your inventory, and use the cog on the corresponding spindle. Players cannot carry more than one cog at a time, regardless of colour.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Clock Tower/Quick guideThe RuneScape Classic Wiki also has an article on: classicrsw:Clock Tower/Quick guide
 This quick guide has an in-depth guide here.
It contains a more detailed description of dialogue, cutscenes, and storyline.

Details[edit | edit source]

Start point Talk to Brother Kojo in the Clock Tower south of East Ardougne.
Official difficultyNovice
DescriptionHelp the confused Brother Kojo find the missing cogs and fix his watch tower. Search the dungeon using brawn and brains to correctly place the four cogs.
Official lengthVery Short
Requirements The ability to run past level 53 Ogres
Items required
  • Bucket of water (obtainable during quest) or ice gloves
Recommended
  • 15 Combat level
  • Stamina potions
  • Ardougne cloak
Enemies to defeat None
{"requirements":"The ability to run past level 53 [[Ogre]]s","desc":"Help the confused Brother Kojo find the missing cogs and fix his watch tower. Search the dungeon using brawn and brains to correctly place the four cogs.","difficulty":"Novice","kills":"None","name":"Clock Tower/Quick guide","start":"Talk to [[Brother Kojo]] in the Clock Tower south of [[East Ardougne]].","length":"Very Short","items":"* [[Bucket of water]] (obtainable during quest) or [[ice gloves]]"}

Walkthrough[edit | edit source]

Starting out[edit | edit source]

  • To start, talk to Brother Kojo at the Clock Tower. ( 1)…
    1OK old monk, what can I do?
    Note: if he gives you a Watch speak to him again
  • Go down the ladder in the middle room.
  • Follow the path to a hub with four doors.

Note: When placing the cogs on each respective spindle, merely move your camera so as to be able to see the ends of each spindle. Each spindle has a colour on the end. When ready to place each cog on its respective spindle, all you have to do is look at the ends of the spindles, find the spindle which matches the colour of the cog in your inventory, and use the cog on the corresponding spindle. Players cannot carry more than one cog at a time, regardless of colour.

Obtaining the red cog[edit | edit source]

  • Head through the south-eastern door.
  • Walk down the passageway until you see some Ogres.
  • Pick up the red cog.
  • Head back to the ladder.
  • Climb up to the ground floor[UK]1st floor[US] and use the red cog on the red spindle (located on the column beside the ladder, facing north).

Obtaining the blue cog[edit | edit source]

  • Go outside of the Clock Tower and head east to where Brother Cedric is (South of Ardougne zoo).
    • If you did not bring a bucket of water or ice gloves for the next section, take the bucket nearby and use it on the nearby well.
  • Go down the ladder east of Brother Cedric.
  • Follow the tunnel to the end.
  • Push the wall to get inside and pick up the blue cog.
  • Climb up the ladder.
  • Head to the centre room of the Clocktower and climb the staircase to the 1st floor[UK]2nd floor[US].
  • Use the blue cog with the blue spindle (the spindle on the south side of the column).

Obtaining the black cog[edit | edit source]

Items needed: Ice Gloves or Bucket of water.
  • Head back to the basement and go through the north-eastern door
    • Go as far east as you can, to the fire.
  • Use the bucket of water with the cog or simply wear your ice gloves to pick up the cog. Make sure to finish the dialogue or you will not pick up the cog.
  • Head back to the ladder. (Do not climb up the ladder)
  • Use the black cog with the black spindle. (In the basement of the Clock Tower on the east side of the column).

Obtaining the white cog[edit | edit source]

  • Head through the north-western door.
  • Pick up the rat poison to the north-west.
    • Take an extra for Ratcatchers if not already completed.
  • Head to the end of the tunnel
    • On the north wall of the dungeon rat cage are two levers.
  • Pull the levers up to open the rat cage.
  • Use the rat poison with the food trough.
  • Wait until all the rats have died.
  • Head through the western gate.
  • Pick up the white cog
  • Climb-up the ladder.
  • Head inside to the top floor.
  • Use the white cog with the white spindle at the top of the clocktower (the spindle on the west side of the column).

Finishing off[edit | edit source]

  • Head back down and talk to Brother Kojo for your reward.

Quest complete!

Rewards[edit | edit source]

  • 1 Quest point
  • 500 coins

rawContent:
{{External|rs|rsc}}
{{Quick Guide}}

==Details==
{{Quest details page|Clock Tower}}

==Walkthrough==
===Starting out===
{{Checklist|
*To start, talk to [[Brother Kojo]] at the [[Clock Tower (building)|Clock Tower]]. {{Chat option|1OK old monk, what can I do?}} ''Note: if he gives you a [[Watch]] speak to him again''
*Go down the ladder in the middle room.
*Follow the path to a hub with four doors.}}
'''Note:''' When placing the cogs on each respective spindle, merely move your camera so as to be able to see the ends of each spindle. Each spindle has a colour on the end. When ready to place each cog on its respective spindle, all you have to do is look at the ends of the spindles, find the spindle which matches the colour of the cog in your inventory, and use the cog on the corresponding spindle. Players cannot carry more than one cog at a time, regardless of colour. 

===Obtaining the red cog===
{{Checklist|
*Head through the south-eastern door.
*Walk down the passageway until you see some Ogres.
*Pick up the red cog.
*Head back to the ladder.
*Climb up to the {{FloorNumber|uk=0}} and use the [[red cog]] on the red spindle (located on the column beside the ladder, facing north).
}}

===Obtaining the blue cog===
{{Checklist|
*Go outside of the Clock Tower and head east to where [[Brother Cedric]] is (South of [[Ardougne]] zoo).
**''If you did not bring a [[bucket of water]] or [[ice gloves]] for the next section, take the [[bucket]] nearby and use it on the nearby well.''
*Go down the ladder east of [[Brother Cedric]]. 
*Follow the tunnel to the end.
*Push the wall to get inside and pick up the blue cog.
*Climb up the ladder.
*Head to the centre room of the Clocktower and climb the staircase to the {{FloorNumber|uk=1}}.
*Use the [[blue cog]] with the blue spindle (the spindle on the south side of the column).
}}

===Obtaining the black cog===
{{Needed|Ice Gloves or Bucket of water.}}
{{Checklist|
*Head back to the basement and go through the north-eastern door 
**Go as far east as you can, to the fire.
*Use the [[bucket of water]] with the cog or simply wear your [[ice gloves]] to pick up the cog. Make sure to finish the dialogue or you will not pick up the cog.
*Head back to the ladder. (Do not climb up the ladder)
*Use the [[black cog]] with the black spindle. (In the basement of the [[Clock Tower]] on the east side of the column).
}}

===Obtaining the white cog===
{{Checklist|
*Head through the north-western door.
*Pick up the [[rat poison]] to the north-west.
**'''Take an extra for [[Ratcatchers]] if not already completed.'''
*Head to the end of the tunnel  
**On the north wall of the [[dungeon rat]] cage are two levers.
*Pull the levers up to open the rat cage.
*Use the [[rat poison]] with the food trough.
*Wait until all the rats have died.
*Head through the western gate.
*Pick up the [[white cog]] 
*Climb-up the ladder.
*Head inside to the top floor.
*Use the [[white cog]] with the white spindle at the top of the clocktower (the spindle on the west side of the column).
}}

===Finishing off===
{{Checklist|
*Head back down and talk to [[Brother Kojo]] for your reward.
}}

'''Quest complete!'''

==Rewards==
{{Quest rewards page|Clock Tower}}

{{Clock Tower}}
